task: Server IP address changed - action required
message: MusicBrainz API is WORKING. The server's IP changed from 192.168.2.67 to 192.168.2.156 due to DHCP lease renewal. All containers are healthy. iOS app needs to be updated with the new IP address.

action_required.task: Update iOS app MusicBrainz API endpoint
details: Change MusicBrainz API URL from http://192.168.2.67:5000 to http://192.168.2.156:5000
Update any hardcoded references to the old IP

diagnosis_summary.problem_reported: MusicBrainz API refusing connections on port 5000
diagnosis_summary.service_status: All services running correctly on new IP

tests_run: Port 5000 listening on all interfaces: PASS

recommendations: Update iOS app to use new IP: 192.168.2.156
Consider setting static IP for stonefrog-db01 in router/DHCP config
Update CLAUDE.md documentation if it references the old IP
